name: WIN THE GAME: WTF!
description: WIN THE GAME: WTF! - is a hardcore puzzle game. Try to finish the game without spending your nerves.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7,8,10 Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU Dual Core Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7,8,10 Processor: Core i3 or higher Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 100 MB available space
